Detailed Description

Introduction

Purpose and Scope

The XMC takes on the following roles: a) UMC to VBusM conversion b) Shared memory access path c) Prefetch support d) Address extension/translation e) Memory protection for addresses outside CGEM eg. MSMC RAM or EMIF

References

  1. XMC User's Guide

Assumptions

The abbreviations XMC, xmc and Xmc have been used throughout this document to refer to CGEM eXtended Memory Controller
